Class FitnessTracker

java.lang.Object
FitnessTracker
public class FitnessTracker extends Object
This Class is to Calculate all the Fitness Elements based on the required this is part of Assignment01 Tasks. it has the instance variables, the constructor, and the calculation methods. Course: CST8284 - Lab 321 Professor : Dr. Leanne Seaward
Since:
java 21.0.4
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
- Mahmoud Ibrahim #ID: 041163059

    • FitnessTracker

      public FitnessTracker(String firstName, String lastName, String gender, int dailySteps, int activeMinutesDaily, int caloriesBurned, int maintenanceCalories)
      The Main Constructor for The program with paramiters for all the needed instances
      Parameters:
      firstName - first name of the user
      lastName - last name of the user
      gender - the gender of the user (male / female )
      dailySteps - Number of steps daily
      activeMinutesDaily - active minutes per day
      caloriesBurned - calories burned daily
      maintenanceCalories - maintenance calories required.

    • calcDistance

      public double calcDistance()
      Calculates the distance walked based on daily steps. Males: each step = 0.8 meters. Females: each step = 0.7 meters.
      Returns:
      distance walked in meters

    • calcWeeklyActiveMinutes

      public double calcWeeklyActiveMinutes()
      Calculates weekly active minutes by multiplying daily active minutes by 7.
      Returns:
      Weekly active minutes.

    • determineActiveLevel

      public String determineActiveLevel()
      Determines the activity level based on weekly active minutes and calories burned. - Active: More than 150 minutes per week and over 2000 calories burned. - Moderate: 75-150 minutes per week or 1000-2000 calories burned. - Sedentary: Less than 75 minutes per week and under 1000 calories burned.
      Returns:
      The activity level as a string: "Active", "Moderate", or "Sedentary".

    • calcMaintenanceCalories

      public int calcMaintenanceCalories()
      method calculate the deficit or surplus calories it is the difference between maintained calories and burned calories
      Returns:
      calculated Calories

      a void method to print all the data after calculation
